description:
Environment multi host: with a controller node and a compute node.

Steps to reproduce:

1) Create an empty volume with availability zone nova.
2) Create an instance and attach this volume to the instance (launch the instance) .
3) Execute nova evacuate with this instance.
4) The command was executed successfully.
5) Then you go to instance detail.
6) And see the error (image attached)
title: Instance detail display an error after nova evacuate
